tweets.text: @SuzVW @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg Is this def cell 1?!

A few pictures of the Trash screen in the #Silkstream(25/05/2021)which show that if litter is not frequently removed, it just tips over the trash screen & the booms after heavy rainfall and ends up polluting the #WelshHarp #cleantheharp @EnvAgency https://t.co/ReCTf5FrTl

What I got from today’s call with @ClareDinnisEA is the @@EnvAgencyMids and the @EnvAgency don’t know what they are doing; they can’t put a timescale on issues; they’re creating a longer term issue by not stopping waste going to Walley’s quarry and there are massive loop holes.

Data on "high consequence" flood defence assets released by @EnvAgency under #FOI/EIR https://t.co/t5gytw6YFC #FCRM #floodrisk #opendata

Context: Thousands of crucial flood defences across England were in poor condition last year https://t.co/2ePFiaU7NQ | @JSandlerClarke via @UE

urls.title: Data on “high consequence” flood defence assets - a Freedom of Information request to Environment Agency
urls.description: 1. Please can you provide me with the data referenced in this article, https://unearthed.greenpeace.org/2021/01/24/floods-northern-england-storm-christoph/ , regarding the condition of the UK's flood defence assets? 2. Please can you provide the wording of the FOI request that Unearthed used to obtain this data. Yours faithfully, Katy Preen

urls.title: Thousands of England's crucial flood defences were rated as poor last year
urls.description: One in 20 defences nationwide and a quarter of defences in flood-hit Warrington were found to be in a poor or very poor condition in 2019/20

tweets.text: I'm SO SICK of the landfill gas from #WalleysQuarry filling my home all the damn time and having to report it in the early hours! Not reasonable to expect us to keep doing this ad infinitum in the hope something will change @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @sinkstopthe #StopTheStink

TEN breaches in total? How can @EnvAgency not close this disaster unloading down? You’ve given @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL full reign to continue breaching. @ClareDinnisEA @BorisJohnson @MattHancock SHAME ON YOU ALL! @StinkStopthe stay strong #stopthestink

tweets.text: Thank you @SarahInNUL for compiling this. @EnvAgencyMids, please can you explain what technical, legal or financial challenges are unique to Walleys Quarry Landfill that prevent you from taking the same enforcement action? We're an understanding bunch, we just want to know why. https://t.co/yBdiMmY6Ag

New #EnvironmentBill directly addresses problems Basingstoke residents experienced when 600+ trees were illegal felled in 2014. My amendment#41would help stop landowners using illegal tree felling to open up land for development 🌲🌳🌲 https://t.co/aawKDurDK5

And why no enforcement&no financial penalties @EnvAgency ?Breach after breach but no punishment/incentive to stop.They’re too busy dumping waste to finish your instructions anyway which you’re partially responsible for when you refused to curtail their waste ops #stopthestink https://t.co/9rw3vW5riw

tweets.text: @tayz_BETH @LoneRanger77777 @JuliaBradbury @KeeleUniversity @KeeleSU @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Our town and community are being destroyed. #StopTheStink

Please @JuliaBradbury The once beautiful view across NUL and Stoke   from @KeeleUniversity @KeeleSU which was stunning has been blighted by this and now we are just stunned. Our view and liberation to enjoy the outdoors are fouled. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe https://t.co/KZWPMbKtrk

Why won’t @EnvAgencyMids act upon our complaints & have turned a blind eye to this disaster. Who tapped phones & was charged for doing so @RedIndustries2 Director. Env health are clearly compromised in some way? #likely @NewsNBC @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe https://t.co/DZjDo6JQld

The @EnvAgency have become a useless toothless organisation.Plenty more pollution issues in the Uk going unresolved as EA won’t act.
This one is something different though, why normalise health harms? It makes no sense #stopthestink https://t.co/NrA0uTgEwa

A community in Staffordshire are living with doors & windows taped up.Nose bleeds, breathing issues, toxic fumes from the landfill site @WalleysL run by @RedIndustries2  The @EnvAgency have found multiple breaches but still operating #socialjustice  #toxic #waste #healthissue https://t.co/46NZiPGPPf

@JuliaBradbury @Jon19861 @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency I live less than half a mile away. No option to move even though I think vof it daily. Mental health is on the rise at a rapid rate, many suffering with breathing issues. Its inhumane and down right cruelty to let us continually suffer on a daily basis.
Enough is enough.

tweets.text:
Today's update from the #GreenwayPolymers incident in #Ketley:

🔥 The fire is now out & the incident is now closed. 
🚨 The emergency phase is over & recovery will begin
🚒 @shropsfire & @TelfordWrekin will now handover the incident to @EnvAgencyMids 
 
🙏🏻 Thank you to all 👍🏻 https://t.co/sgHhz0E5gY

‘It’s terrifying’: the English village overwhelmed by landfill stink https://t.co/QrNNYEWP9c Thank you @JournoJess_ for highlighting this appalling situation for residents in my home city, in particular those with Autism #stopthestink

Currently growing barley but it’s future = concrete. And a massive SuDS area to mitigate against flooding. Because this is a river valley. It handily holds excess water for us for free. Utter madness to build here!! @CPREKent @CommunityPlann1 @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency https://t.co/owzHqgEN8G

Think it would go a long way if they supported a solution & got some top scientists in for the out of control landfill they’ve invested in #stopthestink @HSBC_UK @Barclays
